sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button v-on:click="onRemoveSelected">Remove Selected</button>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent, inject } from 'vue';

export default defineComponent({
  setup() {
    const gridApi = inject('gridApi');

    const onRemoveSelected = () => {
      if (!gridApi || !gridApi.value) {
        console.error('gridApi가 정의되지 않았습니다.');
        return;
      }

      const selectedData = gridApi.value.getSelectedRows(); // 선택된 행 데이터 가져오기
      const res = gridApi.value.applyTransaction({remove: selectedData}); // 선택된 행 삭제
      console.log(res);
    };

    return {
      onRemoveSelected,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 스타일 추가 */
</style>
